title: 2021 Recopa Gaúcha
text:
The 2021 <a href="Campeonato%20Ga%C3%BAcho%23Recopa%20Ga%C3%BAcha">Recopa Gaúcha</a> is 8th season of an annual <a href="association%20football">football</a> match contested by the winners of the <a href="Campeonato%20Ga%C3%BAcho">Campeonato Gaúcho</a> and the <a href="Copa%20FGF">Copa FGF</a> in the previous season. The competition is considered a <a href="super%20cup">super cup</a> of football in <a href="Rio%20Grande%20do%20Sul">Rio Grande do Sul</a>, being organized by <a href="Federa%C3%A7%C3%A3o%20Ga%C3%BAcha%20de%20Futebol">FGF</a>. The match is usually played in January or February prior to the start of the <a href="Campeonato%20Ga%C3%BAcho">Campeonato Gaúcho</a>. However, due to postponement of the <a href="2021%20Campeonato%20Ga%C3%BAcho">2021 Campeonato Gaúcho</a> as a result of the <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic">COVID-19 pandemic</a>, the match will be held only in June, after the start of the season.
The current holders are <a href="Gr%C3%AAmio%20Foot-Ball%20Porto%20Alegrense">Grêmio</a>, and they will be able to defend his title by winning the <a href="2020%20Campeonato%20Ga%C3%BAcho">2020 Campeonato Gaúcho</a>. The opponent will be <a href="Futebol%20Clube%20Santa%20Cruz">Santa Cruz-RS</a>, who was champion of the 2020 <a href="Copa%20FGF">Copa FGF</a>.
